titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 940) to designate the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-873, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 940. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. It shall be in order to take from the Speaker's table the bill H.R. 940 with the Senate amendments thereto, and to consider in the House a motion to concur in the Senate amendments. The Senate amendments shall be considered as read when called up for consideration. The motion shall be debatable for one hour.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 279.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 583.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/20/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of Senate amendments to H.R. 940 (designating the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area).
